en.bdb: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

verse.gurmukhi: pUrw siqguru jwxIAY pUry pUrw Qwtu bxwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰਾ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਜਾਣੀਐ ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਥਾਟੁ ਬਣਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: One should understand the perfect true Guru who has created the grandeur (of creation) around.

transliteration.english: pooraa satigur jaaneeaai poore pooraa thaaT banaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: पूरा सतिगुरु जाणीऐ पूरे पूरा थाटु बणाइआ।
transliteration.en: pooraa satigur jaaneeaai poore pooraa thaaT banaiaa|
transliteration.hi: पूरा सतिगुरु जाणीऐ पूरे पूरा थाटु बणाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: purɑ sət̪ɪGʊr d͡ʒɑɳiæ pure purɑ t̪ʰɑʈ bəɳɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: پُورا ستگر جاݨیِاَے پُورے پُورا تھاٹ بݨاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: pUry pUrw swDsMgu pUry pUrw mMqRR idRVwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਸਾਧਸੰਗੁ ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ੍ਰ ਦ੍ਰਿੜਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The holy congregation of the complete is perfect and that perfect has recited the perfect mantra.

transliteration.english: poore pooraa saadhasa(n)g poore pooraa ma(n)trr dhiraRaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: पूरे पूरा साधसंगु पूरे पूरा मंत्र्र दृड़ाइआ।
transliteration.en: poore pooraa saadhasa(n)g poore pooraa ma(n)trr dhiraRaiaa|
transliteration.hi: पूरे पूरा साधसंगु पूरे पूरा मंत्र्र दृड़ाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: pure purɑ sɑt̪əsəŋG pure purɑ məŋt̪ɹɹ d̪ɪɹəɽɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: پُورے پُورا سادھسںگ پُورے پُورا مںترر درڑاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: pUry pUrw iprm rsu pUrw gurmuiK pMQu clwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਪਿਰਮ ਰਸੁ ਪੂਰਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥੁ ਚਲਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The perfect has created the complete love for the Lord and has ordained the gurmukh way of life.

transliteration.english: poore pooraa piram ras pooraa gurmukh pa(n)th chalaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: पूरे पूरा पिरम रसु पूरा गुरमुखि पंथु चलाइआ।
transliteration.en: poore pooraa piram ras pooraa gurmukh pa(n)th chalaiaa|
transliteration.hi: पूरे पूरा पिरम रसु पूरा गुरमुखि पंथु चलाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: pure purɑ pɪrəm rəs purɑ Gʊrəmʊkʰ pəŋt̪ʰ t͡ʃəlɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: پُورے پُورا پرم رس پُورا گُرمکھ پںتھ چلاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: pUry pUrw drsxo pUry pUrw sbdu suxwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਦਰਸਣੋ ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਣਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The  sight of perfect is perfect and the same perfect has caused to hear the perfect word.

transliteration.english: poore pooraa dharasano poore pooraa sabadh sunaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: पूरे पूरा दरसणो पूरे पूरा सबदु सुणाइआ।
transliteration.en: poore pooraa dharasano poore pooraa sabadh sunaiaa|
transliteration.hi: पूरे पूरा दरसणो पूरे पूरा सबदु सुणाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: pure purɑ d̪ərəsəɳɔ pure purɑ səbəd̪ sʊɳɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: پُورے پُورا درسݨو پُورے پُورا سبد سُݨاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: pUry pUrw bYhxw pUry pUrw qKqu rcwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਬੈਹਣਾ ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਤਖਤੁ ਰਚਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: His sitting is also perfect and his throne is also perfect.

transliteration.english: poore pooraa baihanaa poore pooraa takhat rachaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: पूरे पूरा बैहणा पूरे पूरा तखतु रचाइआ।
transliteration.en: poore pooraa baihanaa poore pooraa takhat rachaiaa|
transliteration.hi: पूरे पूरा बैहणा पूरे पूरा तखतु रचाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: pure purɑ bæhəɳɑ pure purɑ t̪əkʰət̪ rət͡ʃɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: پُورے پُورا بَےهݨا پُورے پُورا تکھت رچاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: swD sMgiq scu KMfu hY Bgiq vClu huie vsgiq AwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚੁ ਖੰਡੁ ਹੈ ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲੁ ਹੁਇ ਵਸਗਤਿ ਆਇਆ।

en.bdb: The holy congregation is the abode of truth and being kind to the devotee, He is in the possession of the devotees.

transliteration.english: saadh sa(n)gat sach kha(n)dd hai bhagat vachhal hui vasagat aaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: साध संगति सचु खंडु है भगति वछलु हुइ वसगति आइआ।
transliteration.en: saadh sa(n)gat sach kha(n)dd hai bhagat vachhal hui vasagat aaiaa|
transliteration.hi: साध संगति सचु खंडु है भगति वछलु हुइ वसगति आइआ।
transliteration.ipa: sɑt̪ə̀ səŋGət̪ sət͡ʃ kʰəŋɖ hæ ɓəGət̪ ʋəɕəl hʊeɪ ʋəsəGət̪ əɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سادھ سںگت سچ کھںڈ هَے بھگت وچھل هُا وسگت آایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: scu rUpu scu nwau gur igAwnu iDAwnu isKw smJwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਚੁ ਰੂਪੁ ਸਚੁ ਨਾਉ ਗੁਰ ਗਿਆਨੁ ਧਿਆਨੁ ਸਿਖਾ ਸਮਝਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The Guru, out of his sheer love for the Sikhs, has made them understand the true nature of the Lord, the true name and the knowledge-producing meditation.

transliteration.english: sach roop sach naau gur giaan dhiaan sikhaa samajhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सचु रूपु सचु नाउ गुर गिआनु धिआनु सिखा समझाइआ।
transliteration.en: sach roop sach naau gur giaan dhiaan sikhaa samajhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: सचु रूपु सचु नाउ गुर गिआनु धिआनु सिखा समझाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: sət͡ʃ rup sət͡ʃ nɑo Gʊr Gɪəɑn t̪ɪəɑn sɪkʰɑ səməɖ͡ʐɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سچ رُوپ سچ ناا گُر گآن دھآن سکھا سمجھاایا۔

en.bdb: The Guru has immersed the disciple in the way of life.
